body_html: Agree with junskang, I have used nikitakit's doing in graph beam search and face this problem. I you use attention you also need to re-order attention. Also for someone trying to use beam search I suggest refering to https://github.com/google/seq2seq/tree/master/seq2seq which has a dynamic implementaion of ingraph beam search. For out graph beam search you can refer to models/im2txt

body: Agree with junskang, I have used nikitakit's doing in graph beam search and face this problem. I you use attention you also need to re-order attention. Also for someone trying to use beam search I suggest refering to https://github.com/google/seq2seq/tree/master/seq2seq which has a dynamic implementaion of ingraph beam search. For out graph beam search you can refer to  models/im2txt
